data.strFullDescription:
[p]Play sounds in voice chats in high digital quality. Try the free demo now!
[/p][p]
[/p][p]You probably heard of soundboard, where people put sounds together like the popular Duke Nukem sounds. With Soundpad you can play them not only to yourself, but also to others.
[/p][p]
[/p][h2]Features[/h2][list][*][p] [b]Play sounds in voice chats[/b]
Works in any voice related application like Teamspeak, Mumble, Skype, Discord or games like Dota2, CS:GO or PUBG.
[/p][/*][/list][p]
[/p][list][*][p] [b]Hotkeys[/b]
Set hotkeys for each and every sound file and play them quickly while ingame. 
[/p][/*][/list][p]
[/p][list][*][p] [b]Sound recorder and editor[/b]
Soundpad has a built-in Sound recorder, which allows you to record what you hear. The integrated editor helps you to cut the sounds quickly. 
[/p][/*][/list][p]
[/p][list][*][p] [b]Volume normalization[/b]
Some of your sound files are quiet while others are too loud? The integrated volume normalization will equalize the volume, so it meets the volume of your voice.
[/p][/*][/list][p]
[/p][list][*][p] [b]Easy setup[/b]
Soundpad extends your default recording device, which most commonly is your microphone, without installing additional devices.
[/p][/*][/list][p]
[/p][list][*][p] [b]Supported file types[/b]
aac, flac, m4a, mp3, ogg, opus, wav, wma
[/p][/*][/list][p]
[/p][p][i]Check out the demo and start collecting your individual sounds![/i][/p]
data.strSnippet: Play sounds in voice chats in high digital quality. Add sounds or music to your microphone signal so others will hear it, too.
